Submodules¶

comet.environment.user_simulator.goal module¶

The Goal represents Simulated usr goals, that are composed of a set of constraints and a set of requests. Goals can be simple or complex, depending on whether they have subgoals or not.

class comet.environment.user_simulator.goal.Goal[source]¶

comet.environment.user_simulator.user_simulator module¶

UserSimulator is the abstract parent class for all User Simulator classes and defines the interface that should be followed.

class comet.environment.user_simulator.user_simulator.UserSimulator(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: comet.abstract_module.conversational_module.ConversationalModule

Abstract class to define the interface for user simulators.
